document_data.name: Kizo
document_data.mainbody: '''Kizo''' was a flatulent blue [[ox]] beast of burden that belonged to an eccentric merchant named [[Yani Pavani]] ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: Kizo's entire career consisted of dragging the overeager merchant's wagon across the [[Sword Coast]]. The beast accompanied its owner to the hamlet of [[Liam's Hold]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, where Yani Pavani forced her interior decoration skills on the [[Hero of Daggerford]]â€“the new proud owner of the [[Stronghold (Liam's Hold)|Stronghold]] keep. When the duo's work was over, Yani decided to stay in the quaint town for a while, and Kizo was happy to chew on the hamlet's abundant over-ripe greenery.
